Important article: Residents’ reluctance to challenge negative hierarchy in the operating room: a qualitative

citation.abstract: Our aim was to clarify how hierarchy influences residents' reluctance to challenge authority with respect to clearly erroneous medical decision-making.
citation.title: Residents’ reluctance to challenge negative hierarchy in the operating room: a qualitative study
